dcterms:description: A dataset for sentiment transfer tasks in English, Hindi, and Bengali, containing 1,000 style-parallel examples for both positive-to-negative and negative-to-positive sentiment transfer.
dcterms:title: Sentiment Transfer Dataset (English, Hindi, Bengali)

dcterms:creator: Sourabrata Mukherjee

dcterms:description: A dataset for text detoxification tasks in English and Hindi, containing 1,000 style-parallel examples for transferring toxic text to clean text.
dcterms:title: Text Detoxification Dataset (English, Hindi)
